item.description:
Boy do the Greeks know how to party!!!!!!!!!!!!

Join us at this Greek Festival in Ipswich for some great food, some culture, music, dancing and all goes to a good cause...the Greek Orthodox Church.

 

The below has been posted by the church for the event:

Greekapalooza 2 is on..Come for a night of dancing and live music by Enosis featuring a guest singer from Athens and music by DJ "Arthur Markos" Thrilla..If you're not Greek come be Greek for the night..Mark your calenders and pass this on to all your friends...General admission is $10..Buy your tickets in advance and pay $7 or buy 5 tickets for $30..There will be plenty of food as well as a complimentary pig roast! Full bar, kegs and a raffle...Enjoy the outdoor festival and all if has to offer. All proceeds will go to the Greek Orthodox Church of Ipswich.

  

If you would like to buy discount tickets, please go to the Whofish website:  http://www.whofish.org/events/Ipswich/MA/Greekapalooza_2/1341582.aspx

  

Please remember that if you get lost, can't find us or are running late, please call the Meetup cell phone at 978-304-2811.

 

Hope to see you all in Ipswich for this great event.

 

Donna & Janet
item.name: Greekapolooza 2 - Greek Festival & Pigroast
